t: Amazon stopped selling certain furniture designs on its website after West Elm called them 'knockoffs' in a new lawsuit

t: Williams-Sonoma sues Amazon over alleged West Elm copies | Retail Dive
s: December 20, 2018 - "Amazon has set up an unauthorized WILLIAMS-SONOMA branded store on its website, falsely claiming that these retail services are 'by Williams-Sonoma' and leading to a variety of customer complaints misdirected to WSI that actually concern Amazon's unauthorized retail services," the lawsuit states.

t: Williams-Sonoma sues Amazon, accusing it of copying West Elm furniture - Los Angeles Times
s: December 19, 2018 - Williams-Sonoma Inc. is suing Amazon.com Inc. in a challenge to the e-commerce giantâ€™s private-label push that started with batteries, baby wipes and phone chargers and has expanded to include clothing, toys and high-end furniture.

Born in Brooklyn in 2002, West Elm is a design-led brand dedicated to helping people create spaces they love. Our team brings together modern style and thoughtful craftsmanship to make great design accessible, with a continued commitment to responsibly sourced materials and sustainable practices.
April 15, 2025 - During 2019-20 West Elm was Williams-Sonoma's fastest growing brand.
West Elm is a modern home furnishings brand that offers stylish, quality pieces for every room. From sofas and sectionals to bedding and decor, West Elm has something for everyone.
